name: Reuben Pizza
author: FITZWIFE
summary: This is a great recipe that I got from a friend. If you can't find whole wheat bread dough, I've used white and I've also made my own.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf frozen whole wheat bread dough, thawed
6 ounces deli sliced corned beef, cut into strips
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
On a lightly floured surface, roll the bread dough out into a large circle about 14 inches across
Transfer to the prepared pizza pan
Build up the edges, and prick the center all over with a fork so it doesn't form a dome when baking
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden
Spread half of the salad dressing over the hot crust
Sprinkle with half of the Swiss cheese
Arrange corned beef over the cheese, then drizzle with the remaining salad dressing
Top with sauerkraut and remaining Swiss cheese
Bake for another 10 minutes in the preheated oven, until cheese melts and toppings are heated through
Let stand for 5 minutes before slicing
